summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Todo List application. Core functionality works well but localStorage persistence is missing.

critical_bugs.issue: LocalStorage persistence not implemented - todos disappear on page reload
critical_bugs.impact: Users lose all their todos when refreshing the page

passed_tests: Todo addition through input and + button
Todo completion toggle with checkbox and visual feedback
Active and completed counters display correctly
Input validation (disabled button for empty input)
Keyboard interaction (Enter key to add todos)
Focus states with purple glow effect
Special characters and long text handling
action_item_for_main_agent: Implement localStorage persistence to save todos across page reloads. Add useEffect hooks to load from and save to localStorage when todos state changes.
